hero.subtitulo2: For you and for the World

beneficios.alto_valor_text: Quinoa is rich in protein, fiber, and essential minerals like iron, magnesium, and zinc.
beneficios.libre_gluten_text: Ideal for people with celiac disease or gluten sensitivity, offering a healthy alternative.
beneficios.sostenible_text: Our quinoa is grown respecting the environment and ancestral traditions.

exportacion.titulo1: We export the best Bolivian quinoa to the world
exportacion.texto1: Our quinoa, grown in the Bolivian Andes, reaches international markets with global quality standards. We are proud to connect our roots with the world.
exportacion.texto2: From the heart of South America, we bring to the world a superfood that nourishes, respects the environment, and supports local communities.
